ygData.subject: Re: Hope this isn't too OT..but
ygData.msgSnippet: get an nvidia geforce 256 with ddr.  they are the best cards out now (high res, works with everything).  also, nvidia has always had stable drivers. ...
ygData.messageBody:
get an nvidia geforce 256 with ddr. they are the best cards out now (high
res, works with everything). also, nvidia has always had stable drivers.
